name: Entrudo
description:
Play rhythm minigames and disguise yourself to join Entrudo’s race

──────────────────────✿──────────────────────

Finn is a young tourist who tries to live life at its fullest by visiting every corner of the world. This time, he decides to visit Aldeia da Pena, a small portuguese schist village in the district of Coimbra.

➤ Entrudo ’s main appeal would be its fun and captivating gameplay, thanks to the peaceful experience of  exploring Aldeia da Pena as well as rhythm minigame you'll find along the way.

▂ ▃ ▄ ▅ ▆ ▇ █ █ ▇ ▆ ▅ ▄ ▃ ▂▂ ▃ ▄ ▅ ▆ ▇ █ █ ▇ ▆ ▅ ▄ ▃ ▂

  • Immerse yourself in a mythical and lively narrative about a carnival tradition of a typical schist village in Portugal .
  • Compete against villagers in rhythm minigames while enjoying Portuguese traditional folk/medieval music.
  • Collect all of the costume items available to help Finn enter Entrudo's race.
  • Interact around Aldeia da Pena to understand more about this village, Portuguese myths and the Entrudo's Race.
  • Explore the vivid environment  of Aldeia da Pena and meet lively characters.

▂ ▃ ▄ ▅ ▆ ▇ █ █ ▇ ▆ ▅ ▄ ▃ ▂▂ ▃ ▄ ▅ ▆ ▇ █ █ ▇ ▆ ▅ ▄ ▃ ▂
